September 9, 2021

My paper with Meital Rosenberg, Daniel Armanios, and Paulina Jaramillo has won the [2021 Research Impact on Practice Award](https://www.nbs.net/articles/r-research-impact-on-practice-award-winners) established jointly by the Academy of Management and Network for Business Sustainability. The paper, titled "Evidence of gender inequality in energy use from a mixed-methods study in India," is available [here](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41893-019-0447-3).
